mapper.sql: from codegroup as a where 1=1 and cdgDelNy = 0
mapper.select:
select aa.* from ( select a.cdgSeq ,a.cdgName ,(select count(aa.codegroup_cdgSeq) from code aa where 1 = 1 and aa.cdDelNy = 0 and aa.codegroup_cdgSeq = a.cdgSeq) as xcdSeqCount ,a.cdgUseNy ,a.cdgDelNy ,a.cdgDesc
order by a.cdgSeq desc ) aa limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}

select a.cdgSeq ,a.cdgName
order by a.cdgSeq desc
select cdgSeq ,cdgName ,cdgUseNy ,cdgDelNy ,cdgDesc from codegroup where 1=1 and cdgSeq = #{cdgSeq}
mapper.update: update codegroup set cdgDelNy = 1 where cdgSeq = #{cdgSeq}
